articles.description: Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhenney took control of Wrexham in February and have now named their new manager, with Phil Parkinson taking charge
articles.content:
Wrexham's Hollywood owners have entrusted new boss Phil Parkinson with making the first big steps towards turning the club into a global force.
Deadpool and Detective Pikachu star Ryan Reynolds and … [+2177 chars]

articles.author: Indigo Stafford
articles.title: Queen mutters 'honestly' on Edinburgh trip as she leaves electric Range Rover - Edinburgh Live
articles.description: The Queen was heard muttering as she arrived at an Edinburgh climate change event in her electric Range Rover.
articles.content:
The Queen was heard muttering honestly as she exited an electric Range Rover during a visit to Edinburgh.
The monarch was in the capital with her daughter Princess Anne for an Edinburgh Climate Chan… [+4395 chars]
